quote: As a child in Atuan, Tenar had learned how to learn. There seemed always to be a great deal to be learned, more than she would have believed when she was a prentice-priestess or the pupil of a mage.
quote_letters: AS A CHILD IN ATUAN TENAR HAD LEARNED HOW TO LEARN THERE SEEMED ALWAYS TO BE A GREAT DEAL TO BE LEARNED MORE THAN SHE WOULD HAVE BELIEVED WHEN SHE WAS A PRENTICE-PRIESTESS OR THE PUPIL OF A MAGE
